kentauros.config package¶

Submodules¶

kentauros.config.cli module¶

kentauros.config.cli file processes given command line switches to eventually determine location of - configuration files (confdir) - source directories / tarballs (datadir) - directory containing spec files (specdir)

kentauros.config.cli.get_cli_config()[source]¶

kentauros.config.cli.get_cli_config(): function that returns a KtrConf object containing CLI settings

kentauros.config.common module¶

kentauros.config.common this file contains common functions, definitions, classes and methods for all configuration methods.

exception kentauros.config.common.ConfigException(value)[source]¶

Bases: Exception

kentauros.config.common.ConfigException: exception that is raised if erors occur during configuration parsing

class kentauros.config.common.KtrConf(conftype, basedir=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

class that contains information about kentauros configuration options. this includes: - location of base directory (basedir) - location of package configuration files (confdir) - location of package source directories / tarballs (datadir) - location of built source packages (packdir) - location of package spec files (specdir) - may be extended

from_file(filepath, errmsg=None)[source]¶

kentauros.config.common.KtrConf.from_file(): method that reads a configuration file and parses read values into object attributes

succby()[source]¶

method that replaces config values in this KtrConf (self) with non-None config values from another KtrConf (other)

validate()[source]¶

method for verifying valid configuration content.

kentauros.config.envvar module¶

kentauros.config.envvar file reads environment variables to eventually determine location of - configuration files (confdir) - source directories / tarballs (datadir)

kentauros.config.envvar.get_env_config()[source]¶

kentauros.config.envvar.get_env_config(): function that returns a KtrConf object containing ENV settings

kentauros.config.fallback module¶

kentauros.config.fallback this KtrConf is used if looking in all other places yields no (usable) results. it defaults to using ”./” as default directory for confdir, datadir, specdir.

kentauros.config.fallback.get_fallback_config()[source]¶

kentauros.config.fallback.get_fallback_config(): function that returns fallback values for kentauros configuration

Module contents¶

kentauros.config module explicitly determines order in which configurations are read. later items in the list can override already determined configuration, or act as fallback if none has been found so far.
